title: Tuscaloosa Symphony Orchestra
text:
The Tuscaloosa Symphony Orchestra (TSO) is an orchestra based in Tuscaloosa, Alabama, United States.  It celebrated its twenty-fifth season during 2006â€“2007. The orchestra performs at the Moody Music Building on the campus of the University of Alabama in Tuscaloosa.
The musical director of the TSO is Adam Flatt.  Korean maestro Shinik Hahm was music director from 2001 to 2010.
